løsningen her bliver at trække på denne side
https://christianknudsen.info/shiny/index/


```{r eval = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(httr)
library(rvest)
shinys <- read_html("https://christianknudsen.info/shiny") %>%
  html_nodes("a") %>%
  html_attr("href") %>%
  .[grepl("/$", .)] %>% 
  paste0("https://christianknudsen.info/shiny/", .)

```

```{r eval = F}
get_readme <- function(x){
  read_html
}
tibble(url = shinys) %>% 
  mutate(readmes = str_c(url, "READ.me")) %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(readmes = map(read_html(readmes, options = "RECOVER")))
```

```{r eval = F}
tibble(url = shinys) %>% 
  transmute(readmes = str_c(url, "READ.me")) %>% 
  slice(6) %>% 
  pull(readmes) %>% 
  read_html()
```
